Articles.Content: I'm having a weird problem with an engine I am making. It looks fine in Blender but when I put it in Unity (or the game) part of it disappears depending on the angle it is seen from, namely the back or side. What causes this?
Triangles are one sided, if you want the inside to be visible you need to create triangles that face that way in addition to the ones facing outward.
yup, just gotta simply solidify your model!
